transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_001768.6 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000283635.8. The two transcripts differ at the 5' and 3'UTRs.
